div.head: 消渴變水
div.div: melting with thirst transformed to edema

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: melting with thirst transformed to edema

sense.def: Pathological Condition of shui zhong 水腫 , edema, brought forth in the aftermath of xiao ke 消渴 , melting with thirst. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry su 蘇 quotes Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 : 消渴變水，服此令水 從小便出 , “For melting with thirst transformed to edema ingest this. If one consumes it, it will expel the water via urination”.
